name: ACPEE 2018 : 2018 3rd Asia Conference on Power and Electrical Engineering
content: ●Publication and Indexing All the accepted papers will be published on Conference Proceeding (Online Publish), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, IET and other academical databases. Selected papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in international journals. ●ACPEE 2017 proceeding has been published in IOP Conference Series: Materials Science and Engineering(ISSN: 1757-899X) and indexed by Ei Compendex! ●ACPEE 2016 proceeding has been published in MATEC web of Conferences (ISSN:2261-236X) and indexed by Ei Compendex!
